ai-tha-ap79:1.2_0: is in the world, he is the lord of the world.
ai-tha-ap79:2.1_0: its colour, is the color of that gold.
ai-tha-ap79:2.2_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap79:2.3_0: it’s given to me five kinds of bean curry.
ai-tha-ap79:2.4_0: for the purpose of sewing a robe;
ai-tha-ap79:3.1_0: With that associating with the needles,
ai-tha-ap79:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap79:4.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap79:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Seyyasaka.
ai-tha-ap79:8.1_0: for the sake of Spiky Elder Nuns
